issue.title: Can not reliably pin & unpin robot to world

content.raw:
Did you set the robot to "nominal" mode before executing your unpinned motion? (The mode was renamed from "unpinned" to "nominal" some time ago) 

cmd_vel -> "nominal" -> squat -> stand -> cmd_vel -> "nominal" -> squat works for me.
content.html:
Did you set the robot to "nominal" mode before executing your unpinned motion? (The mode was renamed from "unpinned" to "nominal" some time ago)

cmd_vel -> "nominal" -> squat -> stand -> cmd_vel -> "nominal" -> squat works for me.
